Game: Phantasy Star II Text Adventure Volume 1- Yushis's Adventure 1991 The first half of the game takes place in the winter of AW 1274, about 10 years before the events of Phantasy Star II. The second half takes place 8 years onward. Rolf (YÅ«shisu or Eusis) is a government agent working out of the town of Paseo on Motavia, and the main character of Phantasy Star II.
